City Commission Members
=======================

The
**Commission of the City of Slaton**
is the elected governing and lawmaking body that provides direction and policy for the City of Slaton. The City of Slaton operates under a
. The governing body consists of four (4) commissioners and one (1) mayor, collectively known as the
*Commission of the City of Slaton*
.

Commission meetings are held on the
**second Monday of each month at 6:30 p.m.**
in the City Council Chambers at City Hall. If a holiday falls on a scheduled meeting date, the meeting will be moved to the
**third Monday of the month**
.

If you would like to have an item placed on the agenda, please contact
**City Secretary Pamela King**
by the
.

* [Clifton Shaw (Mayor)](mailto: cshaw@slaton.texas.gov)
* [Carla Rodriguez  (Commission Member Ward I)](mailto: crodriguez@slaton.texas.gov)
* [Jim Taliaferro (Commission Member Ward II)](mailto: jtaliaferro@slaton.texas.gov)
* [Benny Lopez (Commission Member Ward III](mailto: blopez@slaton.texas.gov)
  )

* [Wade Willson (City Manager)](mailto: wwillson@slaton.texas.gov)
* [Pamela King, TRMC (City Secretary)](mailto: pking@slaton.texas.gov)
* Bryan J. Guymon – Underwood Law Firm (City Attorney)
